00018 #ifndef ALL_PAIRS_SITEMAP_TEST_HEADER_FILE_INCLUDED
00019 #define ALL_PAIRS_SITEMAP_TEST_HEADER_FILE_INCLUDED

00021 #include <ModelSitemap.H>
00022 #include <hash_class.H>

00024 namespace SimSite3D{

00028 
00033 class AllPairsSitemapTest : public ModelSitemap{
00034 public:
00035   AllPairsSitemapTest(const std::string path, const std::string struct_id,
00036                const BaseParameters& args, const bool normalize = false,
00037                const bool load_hbond_surfaces = false,
00038                const bool hydrophobic_query = false) :
00039     ModelSitemap(path, struct_id, args, false, false, false)
00040   {
00041     A_color_bins.resize(ModelSitemap::NUMBER_OF_TYPE_HASH_CLASSES);
00042     create_color_bins();
00043   }
00044 
00045   ~AllPairsSitemapTest() { ; }
00046 
00048 
00059   bool get_bucket_iters(const uint c, const my_float_t perimeter,
00060                         const my_float_t max_len, const my_float_t min_len,
00061                         bucket_vci* bucket_begin, bucket_vci* bucket_end)
00062   {
00063     if(c > ModelSitemap::NUMBER_OF_TYPE_HASH_CLASSES) return false;
00064     *bucket_begin = A_color_bins[c].begin(); 
00065     *bucket_end = A_color_bins[c].end(); 
00066     return true;
00067   }
00068 
00069 private:
00070   void 
00071   create_color_bins()
00072   {
00073     interact_pts_vci A, B, C;
00074     triangle_t triangle;
00075     for(A = interact_pts_beg(); A < interact_pts_end(); ++A){
00076       triangle.vertices[0] = A;
00077       for(B = A + 1; B < interact_pts_end(); ++B){
00078         triangle.vertices[1] = B;
00079         for(C = B + 1; C < interact_pts_end(); ++C){
00080           triangle.vertices[2] = C;
00081           triangle.edge_len[0] = dist(A->pos, B->pos);
00082           triangle.edge_len[1] = dist(B->pos, C->pos);
00083           triangle.edge_len[2] = dist(C->pos, A->pos);
00084           
00085           // Need a minimum value -- cannot have points that are
00086           // almost colinear or duplicate points
00087           int long_idx = 0;
00088           int short_idx = 0;
00089           my_float_t perimeter = triangle.edge_len[0];
00090           for(int i = 1; i < 3; ++i){
00091             long_idx = (triangle.edge_len[i] > triangle.edge_len[long_idx] ? 
00092                         i : long_idx);
00093             short_idx = (triangle.edge_len[i] < triangle.edge_len[short_idx] ? 
00094                          i : short_idx);
00095             perimeter += triangle.edge_len[i];
00096           }
00097           
00098           if(triangle.edge_len[short_idx] > 0.1 &&
00099              (perimeter - 2*triangle.edge_len[long_idx]) > 0.1){
00100             int color_bin = hash_class[A->act_type + B->act_type + C->act_type];
00101             // Probably used a list in ModelSitemap to avoid invalid iterators
00102             A_why_use_a_list.push_front(triangle);
00103             A_color_bins[color_bin].push_back(A_why_use_a_list.begin());
00104           }
00105         }
00106       }
00107     }
00108     std::cout << "bin sizes:\n";
00109     for(int i = 0; i < 10; ++i)
00110       std::cout << "bin " << i << " size: " << A_color_bins[i].size() << "\n";
00111     std::cout << std::endl;
00112   }
00113 
00114 
00115 
00116 //  std::vector< std::vector<triangle_t> > A_color_bins;
00117   idx_tbl_lvl_long A_color_bins;  
00118   std::list<triangle_t> A_why_use_a_list; 
00119   static const std::string A_fname;   
00120 };
00121 
00122 } // end namespace SimSite3D
